urlpatterns = [
    path('', views.home, name='home'),
    path('password-options/', views.password_options, name='password_options'),
    path('generated-password/', views.generated_password, name='generated_password'),
    path('about/', views.about, name='about'),
]
Welcome to the Password Generator

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <title>Password Options</title>
</head>
<body>
    <input type="number" id="password-length-input" class="length-input">
    <input type="checkbox" id="include-uppercase" class="include-uppercase">
    <input type="checkbox" id="include-lowercase" class="include-lowercase">
    <input type="checkbox" id="include-numbers" class="include-numbers">
    <input type="checkbox" id="include-symbols" class="include-symbols">
    <button id="generate-password-btn" class="generate-button">Generate Password</button>
</body>
</html>
Generated Password: xxxxxxx
This website provides a password generator tool to create strong and secure passwords.
